events.text:
Our team spent years on that AI.
It's not like I like my job.
I don't get paid enough to like it.
It's just... 
When you pour so much into something, it's tough to see it tossed aside in a weekend.
And now, I'm reassigned to Cybersecurity.
Everyone knows what 'reassigned' means at QUBE.
It's just a layover to a layoff.
The job market for Machine Learning engineers isn't exactly booming either.
So, what do I have to lose?
Might as well find out what's really going on with AXELIA and what 'maintenance' they're doing at the old facility.
If someone catches me sneaking around, I'll just say:
"Was just checking if I forgot something back there."
